languages.text: {n}Соломон наклоняется к вам и понижает голос:{/n} "Если я должен покинуть флагман на рассвете, значит, впереди еще целая ночь. Возможно, вы пожелаете провести ее в моей компании".
{n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон наклоняется к вам и понижает голос:{/n} "Если я должен покинуть флагман на рассвете, значит, впереди еще целая ночь. Возможно, вы пожелаете провести ее в моей компании".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kommt näher und senkt seine Stimme.{/n} "Wenn ich Euer Schiff im Morgengrauen verlasse, haben wir noch eine ganze Nacht vor uns. Vielleicht wollt Ihr sie ja in meiner Gesellschaft verbringen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kommt näher und senkt seine Stimme.{/n} "Wenn ich Euer Schiff im Morgengrauen verlasse, haben wir noch eine ganze Nacht vor uns. Vielleicht wollt Ihr sie ja in meiner Gesellschaft verbringen?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se rapproche de vous et continue à voix basse :{/n} « Je dois quitter votre vaisseau à l'aube, ce qui veut dire que nous avons encore toute la nuit devant nous. Peut-être aimeriez-vous la passer en ma compagnie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se rapproche de vous et continue à voix basse :{/n} « Je dois quitter votre vaisseau à l'aube, ce qui veut dire que nous avons encore toute la nuit devant nous. Peut-être aimeriez-vous la passer en ma compagnie ? »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙靠近你，压低了声音。{/n}“我会在黎明时分离开你的船，这意味着我们还有一整晚的时间。或许你愿意在我的陪伴下，度过这个夜晚？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙靠近你，压低了声音。{/n}“我会在黎明时分离开你的船，这意味着我们还有一整晚的时间。或许你愿意在我的陪伴下，度过这个夜晚？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se acerca a ti y baja la voz.{/n} «Si debo abandonar su nave al alba, todavía tenemos toda una noche por delante. ¿Le interesaría pasarla conmigo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se acerca a ti y baja la voz.{/n} «Si debo abandonar su nave al alba, todavía tenemos toda una noche por delante. ¿Le interesaría pasarla conmigo?».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたに近づき、声を低くさせて言った。{/n}「夜明けにあなたの船を出るということは、まだ一晩あるということです。私と一緒に過ごしたいでしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたに近づき、声を低くさせて言った。{/n}「夜明けにあなたの船を出るということは、まだ一晩あるということです。私と一緒に過ごしたいでしょう？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sana bir adım daha sokuluyor, sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Şafakta gemiden ayrılacaksam önümüzde koca bir gece var demektir. Belki bu vakti beraber geçirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne moves closer to you and lowers his voice.{/n} "If I am to leave your ship at dawn, that means we still have a whole night ahead of us. Perhaps you would like to spend it in my company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sana bir adım daha sokulur, sesini alçaltır.{/n} "Şafakta geminizden ayrılacaksam önümüzde koca bir gece var demektir. Belki bu vakti benimle geçirmek istersiniz."
